# addSplitViewItem(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a split view item to the end of the array of split view items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addSplitViewItem(_ splitViewItem: NSSplitViewItem)
```

## Parameters

- **splitViewItem**: The split view item to add.



## Discussion

This is a convenience method you can use in place of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController/insertSplitViewItem(_:at:)] method when you want to add a split view item to the end of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController/splitViewItems] array. Calling this method implicitly calls the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController/insertSplitViewItem(_:at:)] method.

If you subclass the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController] class, don’t call this method in your custom object to add a split view item. Instead, call the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController/insertSplitViewItem(_:at:)] method directly.

## Modifying a Split View Controller

- **insertSplitViewItem(_:at:)**: Adds a split view item to the array of split view items at the specified index position.
- **removeSplitViewItem(_:)**: Removes a specified split view item from the split view controller.
